post.author: 권중석
post.content:
Position:                        Junior Webmaster
Type:                        Temporary Contract
Location:                        Toronto, ON (downtown)
Date:                        February 28th, 2005
Application Deadline:                        March 7th, 2005

Tutopia.ca is the perfect online marketplace for English learners.  
We use learner feedback to dynamically adjust the rankings of English instructors in our directory, and audio/video web conferencing to make quality English learning more accessible.

We are presently seeking to fill the position of Junior Webmaster.

The ideal candidate will have an aptitude for problem solving and effective communication.  We place high value on team members who are disciplined and willing to work long hours.  All candidates must have a strong grasp of reading and writing in both Korean and English.  Knowledge of the ESL industry will be looked upon favourably.

Responsibilities

-        Website localization (English  Korean)
-        Troubleshooting / debugging code
-        Develop and maintain website

Required Skills

-        HTML
-        ASP
-        Intermediate Adobe Photoshop

Preferred Skills

-        Flash MX
-        Advanced Adobe Photoshop
-        MS SQL Server
-        Windows 2000/2003 Server, .NET Architecture

To Apply

Submit your resume to david@tutopia.ca.
post.title: Looking for Junior Webmaster
